jp_text: まっすぐ明日を見つめた
google_translated: I stared at a straight tomorrow

en_text: And you paid the price in tears
jp_text: どれくらいの涙と引き換えに

en_text: So we turn our hesitation
jp_text: だから僕らの迷いも

en_text: Into strength by the power
jp_text: 強さに変えてくれる

en_text: Of our connected hearts
jp_text: 繋がった心が解き放つ

en_text: Feel it! These overflowing emotions
jp_text: 不意に溢れ出す思い

en_text: For that someone in the sunset
jp_text: 同じに誰かのために

en_text: I'll use the little courage I have
jp_text: この小さな勇気で

en_text: And overcome the rage of the wind
jp_text: 風が吹き荒れても

en_text: Because I want to protect you
jp_text: 君を守りたくて
